item.title: JDBC Data Types
item.description: JDBC Data Types java.sql.Types name value ARRAY 2003 BIGINT -5 BINARY -2 BIT -7 BLOB 2004 BOOLEAN 16 CHAR 1 CLOB 2005 DATALINK 70 DATE 91 DECIMAL 3 DISTINCT 2001 DOUBLE 8 FLOAT 6 INTEGER 4 JAVA_OBJECT 2000 LONGNVARCHAR -16 LONGVARBINARY -4 LONGVARCHAR -1 NCHAR -15 NCLOB 2011 NULL 0 NUMERIC 2 NVARCHAR -9 OTHER 1111 REAL 7 REF 2006 ROWID -8 SMALLINT 5 SQLXML 2009 STRUCT 2002 TIME 92 TIMESTAMP 93 TINYINT -6 VARBINARY -3 VARCHAR 12
